branchNameLinter.msgBranchBanned: 🚫 Branches with the name "%s" are not allowed.
branchNameLinter.msgPrefixNotAllowed: ❌ Branch prefix "%s" is not allowed. Must be one of: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, revert
branchNameLinter.msgSeparatorRequired: ❌ Branch "%s" must use separator "/" (Example: feat/my-feature) or be exactly 'prod' or 'dev'
